title: I DC in ranked
body: I dc'ed in a ranked game and am trying to alert riot that it was a power cut and that my team shouldn't lose for that, i do not care about my lose as it was my choice to go to an internet cafe. but the other members of my team do not deserve a lose.

replies.body:
If anything, going to a cafe should be safer than playing at home.

But nevertheless, there's nothing that can be done about it now.
